activities.name: Linz Marathon
activities.description: Annual marathon event through the city, featuring various race distances and attracting international participants.
activities.seasonal_notes: Usually held in April, marks the start of the outdoor event season.
activities.booking_tips: Register well in advance if participating. Great for spectators along the route.

activities.name: Pöstlingberg Gardens
activities.description: Enjoy the awakening nature and blooming flowers in the gardens around Pöstlingberg.
activities.seasonal_notes: Gardens come alive in spring; great views of the city.
activities.booking_tips: Combine with a ride on the historic Pöstlingbergbahn.

activities.name: Danube Riverside Walks
activities.description: Enjoy walking or cycling along the Danube river as the weather warms up.
activities.seasonal_notes: Pleasant temperatures and budding nature make for scenic walks.
activities.booking_tips: Path is accessible from various points in the city.

activities.name: Linz Klangwolke
activities.description: Spectacular open-air event combining classical music with light shows and fireworks over the Danube.
activities.seasonal_notes: Major cultural event, usually in September.
activities.booking_tips: Arrive early for good viewing spots along the Danube.

activities.name: Ars Electronica Festival
activities.description: World's leading festival for art, technology, and society, featuring exhibitions, performances, and conferences.
activities.seasonal_notes: Major international event, usually early September.
activities.booking_tips: Book tickets for specific events in advance.

activities.name: Pleschinger See
activities.description: Popular recreational lake offering swimming, water sports, and leisure facilities.
activities.seasonal_notes: Ideal for cooling off on hot summer days.
activities.booking_tips: Can get busy on weekends; easily reachable by public transport.

activities.name: Linz Festival
activities.description: Multi-week festival featuring theater, music, dance, and visual arts across various venues.
activities.booking_tips: Book tickets for specific performances in advance.

activities.name: Brucknerfest
activities.description: International music festival dedicated to Anton Bruckner and classical music.
activities.seasonal_notes: Major classical music event, typically September/October.
activities.booking_tips: Book tickets well in advance, especially for popular performances.

activities.name: Linz International Short Film Festival
activities.description: International festival showcasing short films from around the world.
activities.booking_tips: Check the program and book tickets for specific screenings.

activities.name: Lange Nacht der Museen (Long Night of Museums)
activities.description: One ticket grants access to numerous museums across Linz, open late into the night.
activities.booking_tips: Plan your route in advance, utilize the shuttle services if available.

activities.name: Wine Tasting in Mühlviertel
activities.description: Visit the nearby Mühlviertel region to enjoy scenic landscapes and local wine tastings.
activities.seasonal_notes: Beautiful autumn colors in the countryside.
activities.booking_tips: Requires car or organized tour. Check winery opening times.

activities.name: Linz Christmas Market
activities.description: Charming Christmas market in the Hauptplatz, offering crafts, food, Glühwein, and festive atmosphere.
activities.seasonal_notes: Runs from late November until Christmas.
activities.booking_tips: Weekdays are less crowded. Try the local Christmas specialties.

activities.name: Ice Skating at Hauptplatz
activities.description: Outdoor ice rink in the main square during the Christmas season.
activities.seasonal_notes: Part of the Linz Christmas experience.
activities.booking_tips: Check specific opening hours and potential time slots.

activities.name: Skiing/Snowboarding in Mühlviertel
activities.description: Access smaller, local ski resorts in the Mühlviertel region for winter sports.
activities.seasonal_notes: Dependent on snow conditions, typically December-March.
activities.booking_tips: Check snow reports and resort operating status. Consider day trip packages.
